lead_paragraph: Germany are determined to snap their tournament losing streak to Italy dating back almost half a century when the two meet in a Euro 2016 quarter-final on Saturday in Bordeaux, players said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Germany Desperate to Rewrite History Against Italy
headline.main: Germany Desperate to Rewrite History Against Italy
